titles: Plain dealing being a moderate general review of the Scots prelatical clergies proceedings in the latter reigns : with a vindication of the present proceedings in church affairs there.
author: Gordon, John, M.D.
publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin ...,
notes: Attributed to John Gordon, M.D., by Halkett & Laing, citing David Laing as authority; this Gordon is to be identified with Sir John Gordon in Munk's Roll of physicians ...--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Church of Scotland --  Establishment and disestablishment.
